module.name: Ring Groups
module.description: Creates a group of extensions that all ring together. Extensions can be rung all at once, or in various 'hunt' configurations. Additionally, external numbers are supported, and there is a call confirmation option where the callee has to confirm if they actually want to take the call before the caller is transferred.
module.changelog: *13.0.10* FREEPBX-11233 *13.0.9* FREEPBX-11217 *13.0.8* Use Alert Info Drop down *13.0.7* Move grid to ajax, slideout menu *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10444 Honor CF/CW settings *13.0.5* FREEPBX-6161 Add MOH Category "Inherit" for Ringgroups Similar to Queues *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9601 Ring Group has no pre-chosen Call Recording Option selected, FREEPBX-9602 Ring Group Creation Returns to Edit page with wrong info *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9506 Minor display issue with Follow Me when no extensions entered *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-9467 add search hooks *13.0.1alpha2* Forms updates *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes
